activities.name: Hiking in the Nordkette Mountains
activities.description: Explore the scenic trails of the Nordkette mountain range, which offer breathtaking views of Innsbruck and the surrounding Alps.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring is ideal as the snow starts melting, revealing lush landscapes.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required, but check weather conditions before heading out.

activities.name: Ambras Castle Park
activities.description: Visit the beautiful gardens of Ambras Castle, which are in full bloom during spring.
activities.seasonal_notes: Enjoy the vibrant flora and fauna that spring brings.
activities.booking_tips: No booking needed for the park, but entry fee applies for the castle.

activities.name: Easter Festival Tirol
activities.description: A cultural festival featuring classical music performances held annually during the Easter period.
activities.seasonal_notes: Perfect for experiencing local culture in spring.
activities.booking_tips: Advance booking is recommended due to high demand.

activities.name: Innsbruck Summer Music Festival
activities.description: Celebrate summer with a series of concerts featuring international and local artists.
activities.seasonal_notes: Enjoy long summer evenings with live music.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets in advance as events often sell out.

activities.name: Swimming in Natterer See
activities.description: Cool off in the crystal-clear waters of Natterer See, a popular swimming spot near Innsbruck.
activities.seasonal_notes: Perfect escape from the summer heat.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive early to secure a good spot by the lake.

activities.name: Harvest Festival
activities.description: Celebrate the harvest season with traditional food, music, and customs.
activities.seasonal_notes: Enjoy the local culture and cuisine during the harvest period.
activities.booking_tips: Check the local calendar for specific dates and locations.

activities.name: Alpenzoo Innsbruck
activities.description: Visit the Alpenzoo, home to a wide range of alpine animals, as they prepare for winter.
activities.seasonal_notes: Cooler autumn days make it perfect for a zoo visit.
activities.booking_tips: Tickets can be purchased online or at the entrance.

activities.name: Skiing in the Stubai Valley
activities.description: Experience world-class skiing and snowboarding at the Stubai Glacier, one of Austria's premier ski destinations.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is peak season for skiing in this region.
activities.booking_tips: Book accommodation and lift passes in advance to secure the best deals.

activities.name: Innsbruck Christmas Market
activities.description: Enjoy festive shopping, local crafts, and traditional Austrian treats at the Christmas markets in Innsbruck.
activities.seasonal_notes: A must-visit for experiencing holiday cheer and local traditions.
activities.booking_tips: Visit during weekdays to avoid larger crowds.

sites.name: The Golden Roof (Goldenes Dachl)
sites.description: A landmark in Innsbruck, the Golden Roof is a late Gothic oriel with a roof covered with 2,738 fire-gilded copper tiles.
sites.booking_tips: No booking required; guided tours available.

sites.name: Hofburg Palace
sites.description: Once the residence of the Tyrolean sovereigns, this palace is a remarkable example of Baroque architecture.
sites.booking_tips: Consider buying tickets online to skip the queue.

sites.name: Bergisel Ski Jump
sites.description: A modern architectural marvel offering panoramic views of Innsbruck and the surrounding mountains.
sites.booking_tips: Combine your visit with a tour of the surrounding Olympic venues.

sites.name: Tyrolean State Museum (Ferdinandeum)
sites.description: Explore Tyrolean art and history from prehistoric times to the present at this comprehensive museum.
sites.booking_tips: Check for temporary exhibitions and special events.

sites.name: Innsbruck Cathedral (Dom zu St. Jakob)
sites.description: A stunning Baroque cathedral known for its impressive ceiling frescoes and opulent altar.
sites.booking_tips: Guided tours are available; check times in advance.

sites.name: Swarovski Crystal Worlds
sites.description: A magical experience showcasing the brilliance of crystal in a series of artistic installations.
sites.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online for discounts and express entry.

sites.name: Nordkette Cable Car
sites.description: Take the cable car from Innsbruck to the top of the Nordkette for stunning views over the city and mountains.
sites.booking_tips: Tickets can be bought at the station or online.

sites.name: Tyrolean Folk Art Museum
sites.description: Discover a rich collection of Tyrolean cultural artifacts, from traditional costumes to handmade objects.
sites.booking_tips: Check for guided tours and special exhibitions.
